title: Something is wrong with Jhin
body: He only has two skins. He needs two more immediately.

replies.body:

http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=https%3A%2F%2Fi.imgflip.com%2F1ddb2v.jpg&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425

If you look it's only 3.5
I meant on the actual mine itself. There are 5 bars on it.
http://m.jumpstart.com/JumpstartNew/brands/home/img/home-oh.png

There are actually 4 bars though - 3 health bars and the lifespan bar above them (a former of health).

Art restored.

If you look it's only 3.5
It's only 4 bars for one second
LITERALLY one second

If you give Jhin four skins hes always going to just wear his fourth.

Good point. Can you imagine poor Jhinny boy standing in front of his closet thinking:
"Oh my, which outfit do I want to wear today? Number 1 or number 2...... wait...... 1......2....... OMG I DON'T HAVE AN OUTFIT NUMBER 3 AND 4!!!!!! MY LIFE IS A LIE!!!!!!!!"

am i the only one who read this in jhins voice?

Every reply needs EXACTLY four upvotes (or downvotes). If the reply does not match this, FIX immediately. 

FIX IT NOW.
There
lol

Here's another paradox to keep you awake at night:

A fifth skin that consists of all 4 of his previous skins. Yay or Nay?

It is a very difficult decision indeed but...

...{{champion:202}} Art must exist beyond reason.

So i think I can accept that paradox.
That's got to be driving Jhin nuts.
i was thinking when did jhin get another skin but then i realized you were counting the default

> [{quoted}](name=strike1934379,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=rRF0WirA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-03T13:12:43.141+0000)
>
> i was thinking when did jhin get another skin but then i realized you were counting the default

Here's a dilemma.

If he gets two more skins, he'll have three skin alternatives to his default. THREE.

But if he instead gets 3 more skins, he'll have 5 total if you include his default.


He's set up to lose from the beginning.
He should get a skin on the Fourth of July and on April fourth.
Commented to raise comments to 16, my life is finally complete.
I really hope for something like a Scholar Jhin skin, where he talks about math all the time, instead of art, and explain why 4 is the best number.
And _no_ more skins.
i would be fine with this, but does his base skin count or should he have 4 buyable skins?

Does that mean that they'd have to release skins for him in multiples of 4? Or 4² then 4 to the power of 4? Then 4 to the power 16.

No complaints here. Ezreal will probably still have more skins than him, though.
I thought this was another post about the champion icon glitch lol
